category.name: Integration.CATIA
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: CATIA_product_alternate_shape_rep
preference.preference_description: Management of attached dataset to an item revision of products as alternate shape representation or as component shape representation When the preference is defined, possible values are : 'NONE' to indicate that the first found dataset will be the alternate shape representation by default. or a list of dataset types, the first dataset type common with CATIA_component_dataset_types list, found under item revision, willbe the alternate shape representation by default in CATIA
